welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Succasunna, a charming city nestled in the heart of the United States. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and discover all that this gem has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and a comfortable waiting area.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For private jet travelers, the Private Aviation Terminal at Municipal Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience with exclusive lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, Air Canada, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, Lufthansa, and Air India.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
